website_summaries.verdict: To give the ladies a stylish alternative to the bulky, typical rain cleats, Keds unveiled the Scout Cleat Splash Twill. This sleek kick showcases wet weather-ready features without sacrificing the fashionable flair. This new-level cleat is also reliable when it comes to comfort and lightness which were pointed out several times in the reviews. Despite the merits, several critics opposed owning this for its poor arch support making it not suitable for day-long use.
pros: This model has an affordable price range
Some buyers liked the overall look of their Keds Scout Cleat Splash Twill that will make them look stylish even during the wet season
Few buyers shared that this pair is lightweight
Several reviewers noted that this model is more comfortable than the ordinary rain cleats
A handful of respondents mentioned that this sneaker is easy to maintain as the dirt can be easily wiped off
This model fits right to size
A couple of respondents liked the roomy toe box of the Scout Cleat Splash Twill
Keds offers this in several colorways
cons: A couple of critics disclosed that the traction of the Keds Scout Cleat Splash Twill is insufficient especially on wet surfaces
One buyer complained that this kick is not suitable for extreme weather conditions such as heavy rain or snow
Not many disappointed buyers cited that this pair has lacking arch support

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are a hazard
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not the best quality, but look cute on. However. The hooks on the boots are bad news. I was walking down the street and the lace from one shoe got caught on the hook of the other shoe and i fell really hard and almost hit my face on the concrete. Hilarious, I know. Even funnier is that I was telling my friend the story and she said the same thing happened to her and I showed her the shoe and it was THE SAME ONE!! These shoes have made two different people trip! In addition, the hook of one shoe ripped off from my fall! So they're trash now and I only wore them twice.
customer_reviews.author: Nati1227

customer_reviews.title: Great for me
customer_reviews.text: They’re perfect for me and my lifestyle. They’re lightweight and narrow, not bulky or clunky. I wear them full-time for my job as a coffee bar/juice bar manager so the waterproof aspect is perfect and the fact they’re so lightweight makes me all the more agile on my feet! The only downside is that they don’t have good traction for being an “all-weather” shoe and they’re pretty thin so I wouldn’t wear them in snow or ice, but like I said, perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Good for Bunions!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about these shoes being to narrow, but they stretched out as I wore them and fit perfectly! I have a bunion on my left foot and not on my right. I can put smartwool socks in them and they stretch to fit just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good boot for rain and light snow
customer_reviews.text: I got these when my old snow boots fell apart and they lasted me through a full snowy winter and weirdly snowy spring so far. I chose them mainly for their appearance, which was interesting because I typically only wear men's shoes but loved them. They are not 100 percent waterproof, so you shouldn't submerge them in an ankle deep puddle and expect dry feet, but that's what galoshes are for. The traction on the bottom is great for ice and I appreciate that the sole is thin enough that I can feel the contours of the ground, which is useful when hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Noodle Boodle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: As you can see this product was used. Sent with one shoelace which was covered with hair. The shoes where obviously warn by the creases that are made. Pretty upset considering my girlfriend was wanting these boots for awhile. Im just dissatisfied sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Akg198804

customer_reviews.title: Cute style and feet stay dry
customer_reviews.text: I received these yesterday and today it's pouring down rain. I walked my dog twice and my feet stayed dry! My only complaint is the bottoms are a bit slippery. I love the color and the style is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like these.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these shoes. They're super cute and the length fit as expected. But they were tight across the widest part of my foot. And I don't wear a wide shoe. I walked around in my house for a bit hoping they'd stretch some. Instead my feet felt like they were falling asleep. So, I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shel

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something comfortable An water resistant. This shoes fit the bill! Although, I did find they do slip on tile surfaces or any smooth surface. Such as walking from wet parking lot into a mall. Has the shinning surface flooring. Even after wiping my feet.
customer_reviews.author: cl

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have really narrow heels but a wider toe box, so finding shoes/boots that don't give me blisters is nearly impossible. These were comfy right out of the box! I bought them to be my go-to rain boots, but they look so good that I've been wearing them even on sunny days. The top of the boot is pretty small around the ankles. This isn't a problem for me as I have very narrow ankles, but it might a little tight for others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not waterproof! I walk a lot and thought these would be a good alternative to rain boots. They are comfortable and cute, but they are not waterproof. First walk in the rain and my feet were soaked. The heel area stayed dry, but 24 hours later the toes and material is still sopping wet. Might as well have just got some canvas sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bressler Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great bootie. Super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these booties even more in person. I read from other reviews that they were narrow so I actually ordered a half size larger than I normally wear. I am able to wear thicker socks with them and they are pretty comfortable. I also think they are pretty warm given how lightweight they are. I have not worn them in the rain yet so it remains to be seen just how "waterproof/resistant" they are. I'll update if they are anything less than extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: n00bica

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They are lightweight, comfortable, and fairly water resistant. The boots were also delivered quicker than expected which is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically for a trip to Amsterdam. I spent 7 days in a rainy city walking miles each day in these shoes. I’ve never bought a pair of Keds before and now I’m convinced these are awesome shows. Not only did they look great but kept my feet dry and warm. They didn’t need to be “broken in” and they were light for luggage reasons. I would suggest wearing high socks with them because toward the end of the day, on the one day I didn’t wear high socks, it started getting uncomfortable on my calf where the top of the shoe is! I’d buy these again in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Not so great delivery process.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Hated the wait for it. It seemed to be stuck at a holding site for a number of days. Had to send emails questioning why. Finally received it and am very happy with them but not sure if I’d buy from the same business again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, comfortable and warm as well. I'm a 36/6 and this fit just right with no internal rubbing anywhere when I walk.
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Very cute boot
customer_reviews.text: I have a very narrow foot and these fit great but after wearing them for about four hours just in my house they started to rip at the crease where your toe bends. Would not recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. It’s a nice shoe but it’s too small.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Fit true to size. Light weight, and water proof and comfy. I'm a florist and always on my feet and these are awesome, plus I can wear allot of different clothes with these. Oh and they are cuter in person.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Comfortable, stylish, and waterproof....what more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: beth schornick

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Ked shoes. They fit my skinny feet so well and I get a ton of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

customer_reviews.title: Great material & fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great material, fit, and looks fashionable for rainy days. I live in Miami so these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! Great quality, leak proof... Super cute! I bought them to be my all-season "mom shoes" and they fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh Taber

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: really love these. fit true to size and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: This old knee
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone in this shoe and liked it. I still like the shoe, but it isn't the shoe for me. It's too flat. The flatness caused me to have pain in my knee for 2 days after taking the shoe off. It wasn't the shoe, it was my knee. I desparately wish this shoe would've worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Charnette Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent confront
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking comfortable shoe. Very impressed with the timely arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Susan dale

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Super comfortable and great for everyday wear especially when it’s wet outside.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great! Perfect for traveling where you want a fashionable yet appropriate shoe that handles the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love the!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Once I broke them in they were comfortable! Just like converse
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your socks dry.
customer_reviews.text: They keep your socks dry. They fold too easily which makes it a little bothersome for my left foot.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Bojorquez

customer_reviews.title: Appear to run TTS- not small like other reviews said
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these based on a friend’s recommendation. They’re really cute and the color is great. Will be perfect for wet soccer fields in the spring. Based on the reviews, I sized up, but I didn’t need to. They’re a little roomy and would have fit better if I would have ordered TTS. I kept them anyway and figured I will just wear some extra thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Rmw80

customer_reviews.title: Cute rain boots
customer_reviews.text: I like that they aren’t chunky but I hate that rubs up against your ankles. But a thicker sock should help or whatever you wear to protect your ankles. I stand up at my part time job and wore them for 5 1/2 hours and my feet were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Peanutbutterandshoes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for hrs of walking
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically for a NY trip in January. Did a LOT of walking without breaking into them before; feet stayed dry and never hurt. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jehan Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a men’s 5 for a lady with a ladies ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a men’s 5 for a lady with a ladies size 7 foot. Wayyyy to small. My daughter wears a kids size 1 and these fit her with just a thumb width from the top of her big toe to the edge of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Crum

product_meta.title: Keds Sperry Women's Bluefish Liberty Navy
product_meta.description: Our scout boot was such a hit for its sleek and stylish appeal that we decided to take it to a new level this season with an of-the-moment chukka style. Treated to repel water and stains, the scout chukka is the kind of twill boot that’s not only high on style, but high on function, too. You can kiss those clunky rain boots goodbye. Keds has redefined women's footwear since the early 1900's. With it's quirky women's, girl's and toddler canvas and leather sneakers, Keds are the most populargo-to fashion sneakers for women of all ages. For years, Keds designs have remained simple, casual, comfortable and timeless. At Shoemagoo, you can find an full collection in every size of Keds sneakers that includes the classic white canvas style, cute and printed styles and solid colored Keds. Shop Keds boat shoes, slip-on sneakers, polka dot canvas sneakers, metallic sneakers or opt to shop for Keds snow boots for the colder seasons. At Shoemagoo you will find Keds sneakers in every size, print and style to keep your feet trendy but comfortable in the most popular women's canvas sneakers.
